law.text: The cabinet shall be responsible for energy resource information. The secretary of the Cabinet for Economic Development may enter into a contractual agreement between the cabinet and the Kentucky Geological Survey and any other organizations deemed necessary in order to perform this function.
law.history: Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 499, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1994. â€“ Repealed, reenacted, and amended as KRS 154.12-212, 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 35, effective July 14, 1992 -- Renumbered as KRS 152.075 on July 10, 1991. -- Repealed, reenacted, and amended as KRS 224.0334, 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 325, sec. 17, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 345, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 295, sec. 36, effective July 15, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 186, sec. 11, effective March 29, 1978.

metadata.lrc-note: (11/21/96). In renumbering this statute in 1991, the prior reference to the Commerce Cabinet was changed to the Cabinet for Economic Development (see 1988 Ky. Acts Ch. 205, Â§ 9). This change was made pursuant to KRS 7.136.
metadata.former-codification: KRS 152.075 and also previously codified as KRS 224.0334, and 152A.120.
